name: Little Pink Princess Candy Quest - Bubble Shooter Game
name_original: Little Pink Princess Candy Quest - Bubble Shooter Game
description:
Disaster!! There is not enough Rainbow Candy for the Castle ball!! Time to load up your magical crossbow and embark on the greatest quest ever.

Take the role of the bravest Knight and his trusty steed and travel through the enchanting realms by matching three or more sweets as you go. But hurry, collect all the missing ingredients so the princess can fill her special Candy Maker in time.

Featuring:

- Free to play, fun challenging gaming
- 100 Levels of super bubbling adventure - more coming soon!
- Addictive match 3 Gameplay
- Leaderboards to track progress and show off to your friends
- Magical Spells to help you through your challenges
- Super Aiming Lines for those hard to reach Candy
- Special Timed Levels, Beat the clock!
- Share your Scores on Facebook

Visit us Online:

Twitter: @RisingHighApps
Web: www.RisingHigh.net
developers: Go Free Games - Best Top Fun Apps
